blogPost.excerpt: 🎁 Super Newsletter → Learn how to rebuild Product Hunt's successful products with No-code. —— 🦸‍♂️ Super Bootcamp → Launch your online business — no code required. Side-by-side with me. —— ⛺ ️Super Community → Join a group of talented and driven people.
blogPost.body: 🎁 Super Newsletter → Learn how to rebuild Product Hunt's successful products with No-code. —— 🦸‍♂️ Super Bootcamp → Launch your online business — no code required. Side-by-side with me. —— ⛺ ️Super Community → Join a group of talented and driven people.
blogPost.title: Superbuild - Learn to rebuild Product Hunt's top products with No-code
blogPost.author: Matteo Mosca

localize.description: 🎁超级时事通讯 → 学习如何用No-code重建Product Hunt的成功产品。-- 🦸♂️ 超级训练营 → 启动你的在线业务--无需代码。与我并肩作战。-- ⛺ ♂️超级社区 → 加入一群有才华、有动力的人。
localize.tagline: 学会用No-code重建Product Hunt的顶级产品。

localize.description: 🎁超級時事通訊 → 學習如何用No-code重建Product Hunt的成功產品。-- 🦸♂️ 超級訓練營 → 啓動你的在線業務--無需代碼。與我並肩作戰。-- ⛺ ♂️超級社區 → 加入一羣有才華、有動力的人。
localize.tagline: 學會用No-code重建Product Hunt的頂級產品。

previous.excerpt: Stop wasting time and start creating the kind of content your learners deserve with Docebo Shape. Shape’s an AI-based content creation tool that lets you build beautiful and engaging xAPI content you can share with learners in just minutes.
previous.title: Shape - Get AI-based learning content in minutes

localize.description: 停止浪费时间，开始使用Docebo Shape创建您的学习者值得拥有的内容。Shape是一款基于人工智能的内容创建工具，它能让您在几分钟内创建出精美且引人入胜的xAPI内容，并与学习者分享。
localize.tagline: 分分钟获取基于AI的学习内容

localize.description: 停止浪費時間，開始使用Docebo Shape創建您的學習者值得擁有的內容。Shape是一款基於人工智能的內容創建工具，它能讓您在幾分鐘內創建出精美且引人入勝的xAPI內容，並與學習者分享。
localize.tagline: 分分鐘獲取基於AI的學習內容
